Repeat: insert needle into next stitch and wrap yarn 4 times around the point of needle, then knit the stitch withdrawing all the wraps along with the needle. Repeat from on every stitch across row until last stitch

slip 8 stitches wyib, dropping all extra wraps, thus forming 8 long stitches on right-hand needle.  Then insert left-hand needle into the first 4 of these 8 long stitches and pass them over the second 4.  Then return all stitches to the left-hand needle and knit the 8 stitches in this crossed order.

insert needle into next stitch and wrap yarn 4 times around the point of needle, then knit the stitch withdrawing all the wraps along with the needle. Repeat from on every stitch across row until last stitch

Begin Row: slip 4 stitches dropping extra wraps, then cross 2 over 2 in the same manner used in Row 6 and knit these 4*
Repeat: slip 8 stitches wyib, dropping all extra wraps, thus forming 8 long stitches on right-hand needle.  Then insert left-hand needle into the first 4 of these 8 long stitches and pass them over the second 4.  Then return all stitches to the left-hand needle and knit the 8 stitches in this crossed order.
End Row: slip 4 stitches dropping extra wraps, then cross 2 over 2 in the same manner used in Row 6 and knit these 4
